block.p: BRUDER-Evelyn, 90. Beloved wife of the late Maurice. Devoted mother and mother-in-law of Joan and Stuart Danoff, and Patricia and Charles Debrovner. Cherished grandmother of Nancy, Susan, William, Diane, and Caroline. Adored great-grandmother of Alexandra, Claire, Stephen, Michael, Abigall, William, & Amelia. Services will be held on Friday, October 6, at 9:45 AM at Gutterman's Inc., 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, NY. The family will be at home at 181 Blackheath Road, Lido Beach, on Sunday, October 8, from 11 AM to 4 PM.
